org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication

类 TestMasterReplication

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.hadoop.hbase.replication.TestMasterReplication

  • public class TestMasterReplication
extends Object

    • 嵌套类概要

      嵌套类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      static class  TestMasterReplication.CoprocessorCounter
      Use a coprocessor to count puts and deletes. as KVs would be replicated back with the same timestamp there is otherwise no way to count them.

    • 字段概要

      void testCyclicReplication1()
      It tests the replication scenario involving 0 -> 1 -> 0.
      void testCyclicReplication2()
      Tests the cyclic replication scenario of 0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 0 by adding and deleting rows to a table in each clusters and ensuring that the each of these clusters get the appropriate mutations.
      void testCyclicReplication3()
      Tests cyclic replication scenario of 0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 1.

        public static final HBaseClassTestRule CLASS_RULE

    • 构造器详细资料

      • TestMasterReplication

        public TestMasterReplication()

    • 方法详细资料

      • setUp

        public void setUp()
           throws Exception
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testCyclicReplication1

        public void testCyclicReplication1()
                            throws Exception
        It tests the replication scenario involving 0 -> 1 -> 0. It does it by adding and deleting a row to a table in each cluster, checking if it's replicated. It also tests that the puts and deletes are not replicated back to the originating cluster.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testLoopedReplication

        public void testLoopedReplication()
                           throws Exception
        Tests the replication scenario 0 -> 0. By default BaseReplicationEndpoint.canReplicateToSameCluster() returns false, so the ReplicationSource should terminate, and no further logs should get enqueued
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testHFileCyclicReplication

        public void testHFileCyclicReplication()
                                throws Exception
        It tests the replication scenario involving 0 -> 1 -> 0. It does it by bulk loading a set of HFiles to a table in each cluster, checking if it's replicated.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testCyclicReplication2

        public void testCyclicReplication2()
                            throws Exception
        Tests the cyclic replication scenario of 0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 0 by adding and deleting rows to a table in each clusters and ensuring that the each of these clusters get the appropriate mutations. It also tests the grouping scenario where a cluster needs to replicate the edits originating from itself and also the edits that it received using replication from a different cluster. The scenario is explained in HBASE-9158
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testHFileMultiSlaveReplication

        public void testHFileMultiSlaveReplication()
                                    throws Exception
        It tests the multi slave hfile replication scenario involving 0 -> 1, 2. It does it by bulk loading a set of HFiles to a table in master cluster, checking if it's replicated in its peers.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testHFileReplicationForConfiguredTableCfs

        public void testHFileReplicationForConfiguredTableCfs()
                                               throws Exception
        It tests the bulk loaded hfile replication scenario to only explicitly specified table column families. It does it by bulk loading a set of HFiles belonging to both the CFs of table and set only one CF data to replicate.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • testCyclicReplication3

        public void testCyclicReplication3()
                            throws Exception
        Tests cyclic replication scenario of 0 -> 1 -> 2 -> 1.
        抛出:
        Exception

      • tearDown

        public void tearDown()
              throws IOException
        抛出:
        IOException
